local_intent: Re-align to the T-block and execute the final short push (0.05 m) in direction 90 deg while maintaining visual on the block.
assumptions: Robot is already near pushing height.
Yaw 90 deg is the desired push orientation.
coherence_with_global: Matches the final 0.05 push toward 90 deg after alignment; uses same tolerance (0.01) and timeouts (1200 ms) as in GLOBAL_BT and maintains visibility.
